segments.text: Hello , Tony . Fancy meeting you here . How are things going with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not too bad , thanks . And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pretty good ! How are your parents these days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , they are fine . They are enjoying their retirement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . That's nice to hear . Well , I am going to a football match . I need to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say hi to your family for me .
segments.speaker: S2
